Module kivakit.logs.email

Class EmailLog

All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.core.logging.Log, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.comparison.Filtered<com.telenav.kivakit.core.logging.LogEntry>, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.io.Closeable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.io.Flushable<com.telenav.kivakit.core.time.Duration>, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Operation, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Startable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Stoppable<com.telenav.kivakit.core.time.Duration>, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Named, AutoCloseable
public class EmailLog extends com.telenav.kivakit.core.logging.logs.text.BaseTextLog
A Log service provider that sends emails. Configuration occurs via configure(VariableMap), which receives the key value pairs parsed from the KIVAKIT_LOG environment variable.

Options

The options available for configuration with this logger are:

  • to - The set of email addresses to send to
  • from - The email address to send from
  • subject - The subject line
  • host - The SMTP host
  • username - The SMTP username
  • password - The SMTP password

Example

 -DKIVAKIT_LOG="from=noreply@telenav.com to=jonathanl@telenav.com subject=\"Hello\" host=\"smtp.telenav.com\" username=jonathanl@telenav.com password=snarky-purple-ducky-4127"

Logging

More details about logging are available in kivakit-core.

Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
